extendedInfo.description: Accept credit cards with your smartphone.Making every sale possible.When youâre a customer of Chase Paymentech with Chase Mobile Checkout, a card reader and a smartphone, you are ready to begin accepting credit card payments on-the-go.EXTEND YOUR BUSINESSâ¢ Be ready to take your customersâ payments when and where they are ready.â¢ Take your business with you. Be able to process payments when you are away from your business, computer or credit card terminal.â¢ Allow additional employees to accept credit card payments on their smartphones.STREAMLINE YOUR BUSINESSâ¢ Create a product catalog for easy checkout and itemized receipt.â¢ Live, U.S. based, 24/7 telephone customer support.â¢ Have one payment processing relationship: Single statement, centralized reporting and one number to call for any issues. â¢ Customize your employeesâ access. MAKE IT EASY FOR YOUR CUSTOMERSâ¢ Conduct faster transactions. If your customers are waiting in line, add an additional payment acceptance terminal with your smartphone.â¢ Bring the transaction to your customer. Allow your customers to pay anywhere in your store. Allow customers to pay for deliveries at the time of receipt.â¢ Send customers electronic receipts to their email or smartphone.PROTECT YOUR CUSTOMER AND YOUR BUSINESSâ¢ Credit card information is encrypted at the time of the card swipe and during transmission and processing.â¢ Geo-location features allow you to determine the exact location of the transaction, which helps with dispute settlement. Location map is printed on receipt.â¢ Capture your customerâs signature on receipt. TAKE YOUR BUSINESS WITH YOUâ¢ Easier reconciliation. Be able to view your entire Chase Paymentech account from your phone.â¢ Search for individual transactions and review account activity.â¢ Process refunds and voids.To process transactions, you must have a merchant account with Chase Paymentech, install the Chase Mobile Checkout app and have the Chase Mobile Checkout Card Reader attached to your smartphone.There is no charge to download this app, but depending on your merchant service account terms, there may be charges associated with the purchase and shipment of the card reader. When using the app, message and data rates may apply. Such charges include, but are not limited to, those from your communications service provider. In addition, all applicable processing fees outlined in the merchant services contract with Chase Paymentech will be assessed for all transactions initiated through the app.Transaction processing may be interrupted for various reasons, including service outages affecting your phone, wireless or Internet provider, technology failures, and system capacity limitations.Android is a registered trademark of Google Inc.

reviews.title: Problems with Verizon S3
reviews.comment: I changed over to Chase, they sent my swipper and it has never worked.  They have replaced the swipe reader, and they keep telling me that there is an update that should resolve the problem... next month... I have really been patient up to now, but it is getting old when I have to key in the info every time I take a CC.
reviews.author: Jim Adams

reviews.comment: The card reader will not work with a Samsung S3. Don\'t waste your time trying to make it happen despite the fact that the S3 is on Chase\'s list of supported devices. It has worked on every iPhone I\'ve attached it to but it simply will not function on the S3. It\'s the phone that\'s the problem,  not the app. You can key in the transaction but you can\'t swipe the card.
reviews.author: Molly Ebelhare

reviews.title: Kyocera Hydro
reviews.comment: Funciona perfectamente bien y me ayuda a ahorrar tiempo
reviews.author: Maridalia Mart\303\255nez Mateo

reviews.title: Very disappointing
reviews.comment: I love chase bank. Have banked with them for ling time. This is the first time I had a bad experience with them. First reader came and didn\'t work on my phone. Spent an hour on the phone with technical support - no luck. They sent me a replacement - same story, doesn\'t work. Everytime I called technical support they were rude, and not helpful. Cancel the account without ever being able to use the card reader and got stuck with almost $200 set up and activation fees which they refuse to refund
reviews.author: Alexander Makedonsky

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Would tell my friends that have companys.
reviews.author: erica macedo
